alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 22 at 7:52PM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Greenville affecting Pitt County. For the Tar River...including Greenville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Greenville. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Widespread low land flooding adjacent to the river. Some farmland flooded across Pitt County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EST Friday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 6.9 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1100 AM EST.
